text: John Bolt (born 22 May 1956) is an Australian rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Australian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Australia Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: John Bolt (rower)
